metadata.title: Free Story Prompt Generator - AI Story Generator
metadata.description: Free AI story prompt generator. Instantly create high-quality prompts for any genre and tone, beat writer's block, and spark new story ideas.
metadata.keywords: story prompt generator,AI writing prompts,story ideas,writing inspiration,AI story generator,creative writing tool

children.title: Story Prompt Generator
children.description: Generate creative story prompts and ideas

children.title: Fantasy Story Generator
children.description: Create immersive fantasy stories with AI

header.title: Story Prompt Generator
header.subtitle: Generate creative story prompts instantly. Perfect for writers seeking inspiration or AI-ready prompts.

feature_intro.name: feature_intro
feature_intro.label: Overview
feature_intro.title: What is an AI Story Prompt Generator?
feature_intro.description: An AI story prompt generator instantly turns your genres, tones, and constraints into ready-to-write prompts so you can start drafting without staring at a blank page. It works as both a short story prompt generator for quick ideas and an ai that generates full story prompt for bigger projects.

image.alt: What is an AI Story Prompt Generator?

items.title: AI-Ready Prompts
items.description: Generate structured prompts that drop straight into any story generator or writing tool without extra tweaking.

items.title: Idea Rescue
items.description: Beat writer’s block in seconds with fresh angles for any genre, from fantasy quests to cozy mysteries.

items.title: One Click, Multiple Variations
items.description: Get batches of varied prompts so you can pick, remix, and refine the one that fits your story vision.

feature_benefits.name: feature_benefits
feature_benefits.label: Benefits
feature_benefits.title: Why use our AI Story Prompt Generator
feature_benefits.description: Designed for speed, flexibility, and creativity, so you can move from idea to draft faster.

items.title: Genre-Aware Suggestions
items.description: Tone, pacing, and tropes adapt to the genre you pick—fantasy, sci-fi, romance, thriller, and more.

items.title: Constraint-Friendly
items.description: Add goals, conflicts, or special constraints (POV, scenes, length) and get prompts that respect them.

items.title: Production-Friendly
items.description: Outputs are concise and clear, ready for screenwriting, novels, game quests, or AI chat handoff.

feature_section.name: applications
feature_section.label: applications
feature_section.title: Applications of AI Story Prompt Generator
feature_section.description: Great for any storyteller who needs fast, structured inspiration, whether you open it as a short story prompt generator or as a starting point for longer arcs.

items.title: Fiction & Webnovel Writers
items.description: Outline arcs, scenes, or chapters with prompts that match your tone and genre.

items.title: Screenwriters & TV Rooms
items.description: Brainstorm B-plots, cold opens, and character beats that fit your show’s pacing.

items.title: RPG / Game Designers
items.description: Create quest hooks, NPC motivations, and branching scenarios on demand.

faq_section.name: faq
faq_section.label: FAQ
faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.description: Answers about our AI story prompt generator, usage, and outputs.

items.title: Can I use these prompts commercially?
items.description: Yes. The prompts you generate are yours to use in novels, scripts, games, or any creative work.

items.title: Do prompts respect my constraints?
items.description: We factor in your genres, tones, and constraints (goal, conflict, POV, length) when generating prompts.

items.title: Can I send prompts to other AI tools?
items.description: Absolutely. Prompts are concise and ready to paste into any AI story writer or chat model, and you can treat this tool as an ai that generates full story prompt that you then expand elsewhere.

cta_section.name: cta
cta_section.title: Start Your Next Story Now
cta_section.description: Generate structured, AI-ready prompts in seconds. No signup required.

sample_ideas: A time-traveling chef who accidentally changes history through food
Two rival detectives forced to work together on a supernatural case
A retired superhero running a support group for other ex-heroes
An AI that develops emotions and questions its purpose
A librarian who discovers books can transport readers into their stories
